game.name: Lucipurr
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lucipurr is a multiplayer horror game. Players(1-4) try to stop the cult’s ritual while struggling to survive against the demonic cat, Lucipurr.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lucipurr is a multiplayer horror game. Players(1-4) try to stop the cult’s ritual while struggling to survive against the demonic cat, Lucipurr.
